name: Game of songs - Music & Games
description:
Game of songs is a musical entertainment app, where you can play any song you love with all top casual games, in order to create a next-level music experience you have never got before.
With just one download, you could play every song with every game you want.
PLAY ALL YOU CAN!

How to play:
- Choose your favorite game from the list of full top hyper casuals.
- Explore hundreds new songs and find the one you love
- Play and feel the beat.

100+ songs:
And will be updated every week! If you can't find your song, just comment, and we will bring it for you ASAP.

Game Platform:
With Game of Songs, you can play all hot games just in one place. This will be your new addiction. Ready to get hooked?

Containing different hit games, Game of Songs offer you unlimited fun. Just choose your favorite songs, and play them in all the games.

Just download, and let the fun begin with Game of Songs!
